#summary Wordmobi installation

= Installing wordmobi =

First install Python for your S60 mobile phone. The latest version is [http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=154155 1.4.4]. 

I tested the current version only in S60 3rd edition phones (N95 and E71), using Python   [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/pys60/PythonForS60_1_4_4_3rdEd.sis?modtime=1214578033&big_mirror=0 PythonForS60_1_4_4_3rdEd.sis]
